Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Outburst \Out"burst`\, n. A bursting forth; as, an outburst of laughter. [1913 Webster +PJC]

outburst n 1: an unrestrained expression of emotion [syn: {effusion}, {gush}, {blowup}, {ebullition}] 2: a sudden violent happening; "an outburst of heavy rain"; "a burst of lightning" [syn: {burst}, {flare-up}] 3: a sudden violent disturbance [syn: {tumultuous disturbance}]
